column1: Uchi////Wow. I think this is hands down the best restaurant in Houston. I dreamt about this place for days after my meal here. The food is creative
column5: but not overbearing. The happy hour menu made it affordable for us. I was worried about bringing kids here
column6: but the staff was very welcoming to my kids. My daughter loved the place so much she asked me if we could live there. I wish
